Title: 38860 - # Best E-Cigarettes for Your Lifestyle
Direction: 500 words. Write about 3 to 6 different electronic cigarette brands and what makes them special. Your target audience is men and women who are interested in trying electronic cigarettes, and want to know which brand is best for their lifestyle. Make sure you describe brands that have distinctive products. You can link to the client URL by using it as an example for products in the article.

Title: 38870 - Hack Your Vape: # Simple Hacks That Will Turbocharge Your E-Cigarette Experience
Direction: 500 words. Write a list of 3-6 simple DIY hacks for tech-minded people who enjoy e-cigarettes. Include hacks that increase the quantity of vapor, storage hacks, cleaning hacks, etc. Your audience is comfortable with taking things apart and enjoys applying their own creativity and problem-solving skills, so they don't need step-by-step instructions for anything that isn't highly technical. You could embed the anchor text in a tip for mixing flavors.

Title: 38872 - # White-Hot Trends Techies Are Embracing in 2016
Direction: 500 words. Write a list of 3-6 gadgets and trends that tech-minded people are integrating into their personal lives (as opposed to general trends in the field of technology). These could be brand-new gadgets that are taking early-adopters by storm, or items that were introduced earlier but are now being widely embraced. Your readers are tech-minded and tend to be excited about gadgetry and real-life application of ideas from science fiction. Include e-cigarettes as both an alternative to smoking (where the anchor text should find a good fit) and as gadgets that techies enjoy collecting, enhancing, and modifying.
